description.p:
Whenver you are 5 feet of an allies creature, gain the following effects:
Gain a +1 to spell attack and attack rolls
If the ally within range of Back-to-Back takes damage, may use your reaction to split the damage between yourself and your ally

If another allies creature within 5 feet of you also has this feat, gain these effects on top of the others:
You get advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are within the first range bracket of your ranged weapon.
Increase your armor class by 1 as long as you are still within range of the allied creature.
When you are within 5 feet of an ally, gain +1 to attack and spell attack rolls and may use a reaction to instead take half the damage that the ally would have originally taken.

If your ally also has this feat, gain advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are within the first range bracket of your ranged weapon and increase your armor class by 1 while within range of your ally.
